@pjh5 Here's the new error I'm getting now:

/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp: In member function ‘bool at::native::ConvParams::use_mkldnn(const at::Tensor&) const’:
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: error: no match for ‘operator==’ (operand types are ‘at::Backend’ and ‘const at::DeviceType’)
   return input.type().backend() == kCPU &&
          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: note: candidate: ‘operator==(at::DeviceType, at::DeviceType)’ <built-in>
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: note:   no known conversion for argument 1 from ‘at::Backend’ to ‘at::DeviceType’
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: note: candidate: ‘operator==(at::Backend, at::Backend)’ <built-in>
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: note:   no known conversion for argument 2 from ‘const at::DeviceType’ to ‘at::Backend’
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:1652: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/__/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp.o' failed

root@2944b1432961:/opt/pytorch# '

body:
@pjh5 Here's the new error I'm getting now:

```
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp: In member function ‘bool at::native::ConvParams::use_mkldnn(const at::Tensor&) const’:
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: error: no match for ‘operator==’ (operand types are ‘at::Backend’ and ‘const at::DeviceType’)
   return input.type().backend() == kCPU &&
          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: note: candidate: ‘operator==(at::DeviceType, at::DeviceType)’ <built-in>
/opt/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Convolution.cpp:123:33: note:   no known conversion for argument 1 from ‘at::Backend’ to ‘at::DeviceType’
```
